sentence.Network_en: Despite strong principles he was never censorious.
sentence.Network_cn: 虽然他原则性很强，可从来不会吹毛求疵。

sentence.Network_en: His treatment of him is sympathetic rather than readily censorious.
sentence.Network_cn: 他对他的态度是同情而并非一味批评.

sentence.Network_en: And what fun to eat all you wanted without having censorious people say you weren't ladylike.
sentence.Network_cn: 想吃什么,就吃什么,也没有人指责你缺乏大家闺秀的风度,真是痛快.

GRE 词汇表(红宝书) - 豆丁网 ... censorship n． 检查（制度） censorious adj． 吹毛求疵的，苛求的 censure n．v． 责难，非难.
松松：3天背完GRE难词 ... cavil ：vi. 挑剔, 找错 25。 censorious：adj. 受批判的, 挑剔的 26。 coax ：v. 哄, 耐心使... 27。.

means.word_mean: 吹毛求疵的,严厉批评的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: from Latin censorius (from censor ‘magistrate’) + -ious

entry.def: If you describe someone as censorious, you do not like the way they strongly disapprove of and criticize someone else's behaviour.

example.ex: Despite strong principles he was never censorious.
example.tran: 虽然他原则性很强，可从来不会吹毛求疵。

auth_sentence.content: It is censorious of the supposed failings of others.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is censorious of the supposed failings of others.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is censorious of the supposed failings of others.

auth_sentence.content: Bath is a very censorious Place.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Bath is a very censorious Place.

auth_sentence.content: He felt these prejudices to be peculiar to himself; none of them made him at all censorious of anyone else.
auth_sentence.res_content: He felt these prejudices to be peculiar to himself; none of them made him at all censorious of anyone else.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He felt these prejudices to be peculiar to himself; none of them made him at all censorious of anyone else.

stems_affixes.word_buile: censor[n.检查员 v.审查,检查]+ious……的→adj.吹毛求疵的,苛求的
cens判断+or人→判断之人→审查员
cens判断+us表名词→查[人口]→普查
cens判断+ure表名词→判断审查[别人]→责难
cens判断+or人→判断之人→审查员

sentences.cn: 对细微的不足非常挑剔
